rows.label: tlk41200121_01_msg0001
rows.name:
My dad was saying that the way
Drivers learn stuff is pretty different
from normal people.

rows.label: tlk41200121_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Like, they can use the experience
they've built up in the past to develop
whatever skills they need right now.

rows.label: tlk41200121_01_msg0003
rows.name:
That's kind of the opposite of how
it works normally, huh?

rows.label: tlk41200121_01_msg0004
rows.name:
But it means Drivers have to stop and
rest from time to time, to think about
what skills are most important.
